About Me

BIO

Jonathan is an enthusiastic software engineer with a strong ambition to become an expert within software development. During his studies at the Hague University and his young career Jonathan has gained experience in working with SQL, database management systems, software development methodologies, frontend development and various different programming languages.

Jonathan is independent but can also work well in teams. He is a quick learner, is sociable and adapts well to new environments. He has a passion for programming and is constantly working to enhance his software development skills. He is certified in MCSD: Web Application and in Java SE7 Oracle Certified Professional (OCP).

Besides his passion for programming, his other hobbies are basketball and tennis. He also likes to play video games or go to the movies with friends.
